Hero.text: I am a Full Stack developer from Brazil with over 1 year of experience. While I work across all layers of web development, I have a strong inclination towards front-end. I enjoy solving problems and am always open to new possibilities in the future. Let's build something amazing together!

About.title: About Me
About.description1: My journey in technology began with my training as an IT Technician at Unesp FCAV in Jaboticabal, where I developed my first programming projects. Subsequently, I started my undergraduate studies in Information Systems at the Federal University of Uberlândia (UFU), which further expanded my technical and academic foundation.
About.description2: Currently, I work as a Full-Stack Developer, engaging in all stages of web development. My experience includes both Front-End, with the creation of interfaces, and Back-End, developing robust and scalable APIs with Node.js.
About.description3: I also have solid knowledge in relational and non-relational databases, as well as experience with ORMs and infrastructure such as Docker.

Projects.title: My Projects
Projects.description: Check out some of the projects I have developed throughout my career as a developer below
